author: srowen
msg: All test cases extend MahoutTestCase, and related updates to use of RandomUtils to ensure in test mode that all RNGs are deterministic. Minor code style changes. Unit tests now do not fork a JVM per test.

msg: A launcher for the payment spring scatag contribution.
